system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user freely Moves up to half of their Flight Score, and ends their activation. While in this state, they have +4 EVA stages.
Resolution: On their next activation, the user freely attacks up to one-and-a-half times their Flight Score and attacks with and resolves Fly.

actions.name: Fly
